original_text: “‘If your offering is a fellowship offering, and you offer an animal from the herd, whether male or female, you are to present before the Lord an animal without defect.
korean_text: 사람이 만일 화목제의 제물을 예물로 드리되 소로 드리려면 수컷이나 암컷이나 흠 없는 것으로 여호와 앞에 드릴지니

sentences.original_text: If your offering is a fellowship offering,
and you offer an animal from the herd,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신이 가축 중에서 동물을 바친다면,

sentences.original_text: you are to present before the Lord
